product_name: MOON Colorado Camping: The Complete Guide to Tent and RV Camping - 4th Edition
long_description: Are you planning to do some RV Camping, hiking into the backcountry or just looking for a quick getaway? Let the updated Moon Handbooks: Colorado Camping be your guide.
